message: Starting analysis: scanning repo for Streamlit app and st.rerun usage to plan fixes.
Repo scanned. Manager app already removed most st.rerun; applied improvements for controlled refresh/logs; preparing targeted tests.
Patched manager: removed reruns, added safe refresh buttons and optional logs autorefresh; smoke-tested Streamlit startup.
Completed: removed unnecessary st.rerun() from manager controls, added safe refresh options (services + logs), and smoke-tested app start. Ready for tester verification.
